valon3.EyesMode: Different modes for RGB or RGB+W NeoPixel strips
valon3.Strip.clear:
Turn off all LEDs.
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
valon3.Strip.setBrightness: Set the brightness of the strip. This flag only applies to future operation.
valon3.Strip.setBrightness|param|brightn: a measure of LED brightness in 0-255. eg: 255
valon3.Strip.setEyesColor: Set LED to a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b).
valon3.Strip.setEyesColor|param|eyes_n: position of the NeoPixel in the strip
valon3.Strip.setPin: Set the pin where the neopixel is connected, defaults to P11.
valon3.Strip.setPixelColor:
Set LED to a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b).
You need to call ``show`` to make the changes visible.
valon3.Strip.setPixelColor|param|pixelof: position of the NeoPixel in the eyes. eg: 1
valon3.Strip.show: Send all the changes to the eyes.
valon3.Strip.showColor: Shows all LEDs to a given color (range 0-255 for r, g, b).
valon3.colors: Gets the RGB value of a known color
valon3.connectIrReceiver: Connects to the IR receiver module at the specified pin and configures the IR protocol.
valon3.create: Create a new NeoPixel driver for eye's LEDs.
valon3.create|param|numleds: number of leds in the eyes, eg: 2
valon3.hsl: Converts a hue saturation luminosity value into a RGB color
valon3.irButton: Returns the code of the IR button that was pressed last. Returns -1 (IrButton.Any) if no button has been pressed yet.
valon3.irButtonCode: Returns the command code of a specific IR button.
valon3.motorRun: Set the direction and speed of valon motor.
valon3.onIrButton: Do something when a specific button is pressed or released on the remote control.
valon3.onIrButton|param|handler: body code to run when event is raised
valon3.enablePatrol: Enable or Disable line tracking sensor.
valon3.rgb: Converts red, green, blue channels into a RGB color
valon3.rgb|param|blue: value of the blue channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
valon3.rgb|param|green: value of the green channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
valon3.rgb|param|red: value of the red channel between 0 and 255. eg: 255
valon3.wasAnyIrButtonPressed: Returns true if any button was pressed since the last call of this function. False otherwise.
